description: &7[Origins/Minus/Statures]&r Press &7[&r&6ALT+O&r&7]&r to review your selected &3origin&r and &3stature&r, affecting your &dabilities&r and &dsize&r.
&7[Fabrication]&r Type &6/hidearmor&r to hide some or all &3Armor&r to better show your skin. Type &6/showarmor&r to reverse this change.
&7[Drogstyle/StyledNicknames]&r In Multiplayer, type &6/nick&r to set your nickname, and &6/colour&r and &6/bio&r to style it.
&7[Fabric Tailor]&r Press &7[&r&6ALT+T&r&7]&r to change your skin in this world, including drag-n-dropping a skin file into the &3local skin upload&r tab.
&7[Ears]&r Your skin can include &dears, claws, tails, wings, horns&r, and other features when added to the skin file and configured using the &3Ears Skin Manipulator&r online.

&7[Switchy]&r Press &7[&r&6;&r&7]&r to open the &3preset switcher&r, which allows you to create &3player profiles&r in this world. Profiles can contain &dorigins, skins, nicknames, and optionally inventories and position&r!
